newsArray.title: भारत में अक्सर ऐसी विकेट नहीं मिलती...4 विकेट लेने के बाद सिराज खुलकर बोले, जानिए पूरा मामला
creator: Live_Hindustan
newsArray.description: तेज गेंदबाज मोहम्मद सिराज ने भारत और वेस्टइंडीज के बीच जारी मैच की पिच को लेकर कहा कि भारत में टेस्ट क्रिकेट में अक्सर ऐसी विकेट नहीं मिलती। उन्होंने कहा कि हरी विकेट पर गेंदबाजी करके अच्छा लग रहा।

creator: Sandeep Gupta
newsArray.description: Ravichandran Ashwin: रविचंद्रन अश्विन की तरफ से यूएई की इंटरनेशनल लीग टी20 में नहीं चुने जाने पर रिएक्‍शन दिया गया. अश्विन बीबीएल में सिडनी थंडर्स का हिस्‍सा बनने जा रहे हैं. उन्‍होंने इसी साल अंतरराष्‍ट्रीय क्रिकेट से भी संन्‍यास ले लिया है.

newsArray.title: How Abhishek Sharma Was Mentored by Yuvraj Singh to Be India’s Match-Winner
creator: Asianet Newsable English
newsArray.description: Yuvraj Singh had mentored Indian Batsman Abhishek Sharma, setting the goal for him to become a match-winner for India and providing detailed coaching and analysis to help him improve. Watching Yuvraj's six sixes inspired him to turn professional.

newsArray.title: IND vs WI: ಸೆಹ್ವಾಗ್-ಗವಾಸ್ಕರ್ ಕ್ಲಬ್‌ಗೆ ಕನ್ನಡಿಗ ಕೆಎಲ್​ ರಾಹುಲ್ ಸೇರ್ಪಡೆ
creator: Mahadevaswamy M
newsArray.description: ವೆಸ್ಟ್ ಇಂಡೀಸ್ ವಿರುದ್ಧದ ಮೊದಲ ಟೆಸ್ಟ್ ಪಂದ್ಯದ ಮೊದಲ ದಿನದಾಟದಂದು ಟೀಮ್ ಇಂಡಿಯಾ ಸ್ಟಾರ್ ಬ್ಯಾಟರ್ ಕೆಎಲ್ ರಾಹುಲ್ ಅರ್ಧಶತಕ ಗಳಿಸುವ ಮೂಲಕ ಸುನಿಲ್ ಗವಾಸ್ಕರ್ ಮತ್ತು ವೀರೇಂದ್ರ ಸೆಹ್ವಾಗ್ ಕ್ಲಬ್‌ಗೆ ಸೇರಿಕೊಂಡಿದ್ದಾರೆ.

newsArray.title: PAK W vs BAN W, Women's World Cup 2025: Rubya Haider's Unbeaten 54 Consigns Pakistan To Demoralizing 7-Wicket Loss In Colombo
creator: Aayushman Vishwanathan
newsArray.description: Bangladesh cricket team began their Women's World Cup 2025 in style as they defeated Pakistan by seven wickets on October 2, Thursday at the R. Premadasa Stadium in Colombo. Bangladesh delivered an outstanding bowling performance after losing the toss in Colombo and overcame early nerves to gun down the target as Rubya Haider starred.

newsArray.title: Who is Sana Mir? ICC’s Hall of famer’s ‘Azad Kashmir’ comment stirs tensions ahead of India vs Pakistan clash
creator: Aditya Mallick
newsArray.description: Former Pakistan captain and ICC Hall of Famer Sana Mir is under fire for using the term "Azad Kashmir" on-air during Women's World Cup commentary. Her remark, made ahead of the high-stakes India vs Pakistan match, has triggered backlash across Indian social media.The post Who is Sana Mir? ICC’s Hall of famer’s ‘Azad Kashmir’ comment stirs tensions ahead of India vs Pakistan clash appeared first on News24.
